text: Ia Israelian anababar gumazamiziba ko ian gumazir dapaniba bar, iza uari akuvazɨ, kɨ Akar Gavgaviba ia ganɨngi. Akar Gavgavir e isir kaba, da bizir bar ekiaba, egha da en navir averiabar aven bizir igharazibagh afira. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn Ikiavɨra Itir God Israelian atrivimɨn oto.”33:4-5 Hibrun akam, ves 2ɨn ikegha ghua ves 5ɨn tuzimɨn aven, a deragha mɨgeir puvatɨ.
